title: Virtual Classroom Simulation-Based Teaching Practice Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary mathematics fundamentals and general classroom management methods
context.additional_context: A process of refining teaching skills in a virtual classroom simulation platform accessed via personal devices, in an environment similar to real classes, with project-based assessment measuring final performance capabilities.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design and implement mathematical discussion lessons in a virtual classroom environment.
Preservice teachers can effectively manage various situations that may arise during lessons through interactions with student avatars.
Preservice teachers can evaluate their teaching performance and establish improvement plans based on simulation feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
